body:
My d*ck grows 1 inch every month, while I spend about 10 hours per week working for Amazon. They also pay me $93 every hour, but I don't even care about that, because I'm so busy being amazed by how huge my d*ck is now. My younger sibling companion's d*ck actually grows about 1.3 inches per month, working about 12 hours per week, and she's a girl. All the females in my life can barely accept how huge my d*ck got after I started doing this. Now everywhere I go, my d*ck follows along right behind me, flapping in the wind like a meaty cape.

Www.MyD1ckIsBiggerThanYours.chinchinʸᵉˢ
